overview: It is the story of a three-day long rural wedding, the cultural richness and history of Taurus mountain region of Turkey. Village youngsters curious to know of past times, engage in conversations with their elders. `Whispering Memories` is not a story of Armenians who had to leave but of those who stayed behind and silently became Muslims, they are now called the `Converts`.
title: Whispering Memories
